author: Courtney Dickson
title: B.C. radio host gets shout out on The Office star John Krasinksi's good news series
description: A B.C. radio personality may have just got his big break as self-appointed co-host on a good news show produced by John Krasinski, the star of the television series The Office.
content:
A B.C. radio personality may have just got his big break as self-appointed co-host on a good news show produced by John Krasinski, the star of the television series The Office.
Stephen Keppler, a host on EZ Rock Kelowna, tweeted the actor with his local rend… [+2191 chars]
